page.title: 07SAVE OUR SWIMMING POOL!
page.content: The swimming pool was built in the early 1960's by parents.The{P.T.A.} have always paid for the upkeep and heating. In 1983 the pool was painted but it soon flaked and it wasn't used. In October 1984 the A.G.M. decided to keep the pool open and had to raise Â£6,000 in five months. The fund_raising schemes were as follows:_ 1.{50/50 AUCTION}that raised Â£550; 2.{A MUSICAL_"HOW THE WEST WAS ONE" } that totalled Â£1640; 3.{BMX FREESTYLE EVENT}(stunt bikes) raised Â£450; 4.{SPONSORED WALK}raised Â£1200; 5.{SPONSORED SLIM}(the Head decided to lose weight and was sponsored for every pound lost) and raised Â£700. 6.{DONATIONS}totalled Â£1100. The pool was opened in June 1985, much to the relief of staff, parents and pupils....by Jeffrey Cole.
